credit_line: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
title: New Achitectural Exhibition - Mars Group at New Burlington Galleries
medium: Lithograph, red ink stamped, on tan wove paper
description:
Central image, resembling an abstracted hourglass, consists of gray and blue solid geometric shapes linked by a black linear element. Surrounding the image are words pertaining to the architecture exhibition in blue, gray and black lettering, in both capital and lower case.
The poster celebrates am exhibition of modern architecture, designed by the MARS group, held at the New Burlington Gallery in London, from January 12th to 29th, 1938. 
New Architecture/ Exhibition of / The Elements of / A / Modern Architecture / Designed by /  MARS Group / New Burlington Galleries / Burlington Gardens W 1 / January 12th to 29th 1038 / 10 A.M. to 8 P.M. Admission 1/-
name: Poster
